entries.journal_entry_description: Risha Sinan needs samples of Bark Mites.  Travel to the Giant Bark Mite cave and collect them for her.  Return to her when done.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the Giant Bark Mite Cave
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Collect 1 Mutant Bark Mite Queen Sample
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Collect 1 Mutant Bark Mite Soldier Sample
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Collect 3 Mutant Bark Mite Worker Samples
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: When all the samples are collected, return to Risha Sinan in Restuss
